idinfo.useconst:
For use at 1:24,000 or smaller scale.
For educational/demonstration purposes only. The Originator, Publisher and Distributor exclude any and all implied warranties and make no warranty or representation with respect to the data files or accompanying documentation, including quality, performance, merchantability or fitness for a particular purpose. These data files and documentation are provided "as is" and the User assumes the entire risk as to their quality and performance
These data should not be redistributed for commercial profit. Reproduction or redistribution of this digital data set without permission of the Originator/Publisher is expressly forbidden. The Originator and Publisher should be clearly cited in any product derived from this data.
The zoning data represented in this layer should not be used as the sole method of determining the zoning of any one parcel or parcels.

cntorgp.cntorg: Municipality of Murrysville Community Development Office

attracc.attraccr: Attributes have been checked by visual comparison of source against the hard copy zoning map approved by Council as well as zoning changes since the publication of the hard copy zoning map.

dataqual.logic: Data set topology exists. No duplicate features. All polygons closed as verified from hard copy plots.
dataqual.complete: Complete for all areas in the bounding coordinates except the Borough of Export.

horizpa.horizpar: Visual verification against parcel layer and hard copy zoning map.

citeinfo.title: Zoning Districts of the Municipality of Murrysville

srcinfo.srccontr: Locations of zoning district boundaries as of 1992

procstep.procdesc: Initially, parcels were unioned according to zoning. The hardcopy Zoning District Map was used to digitize in boundaries that crossed parcel lines. The resulting digital map of zoning districts was compared with the preceding sources and cases involving zoning changes since 1992, when the Zoning District Map was last published, were reviewed and edited. Relevant changes were made to the parcel based zoning data.

cntorgp.cntorg: Municipality of Murrysville Community Development Office

overview.eaover: The table zoning.dbf contains the following fields: Zoning Zoning Distict MinSetFront Minimum front yard setback MinSetSide Minimum side yard setback MinSetRear Minimum rear yard setback MinLotSize Minimum lot size MinFrontage Minimum lot frontage

cntorgp.cntorg: Municipality of Murrysville Community Development Office
